response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return and ensuring you receive a competitive deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
